overview.description: A Telegram bot application for saving and forwarding restricted content from Telegram channels and groups, with web interface for record management and media storage capabilities

architecture.style: Layered modular architecture with MVC pattern for web interface

key_components.name: Bot Core
key_components.description: Client initialization, message queue, and startup configuration management

key_components.name: Message Handlers
key_components.description: Telegram message, command, and callback handlers for bot interactions

key_components.name: Content Filters
key_components.description: Keyword, regex, and extract filters for content processing

key_components.name: Services Layer
key_components.description: Configuration management, calibration scheduler, and peer caching services

key_components.name: Flask Web App
key_components.description: Web interface for note management, admin panel, and media serving

key_components.name: Database Layer
key_components.description: SQLite database operations for notes, users, and calibration tasks

key_components.name: Storage Manager
key_components.description: WebDAV client and local/remote media storage management

key_components.name: Message Workers
key_components.description: Background message processing workers with queue management

key_components.name: Utilities
key_components.description: Logger, progress tracking, status management, and helper functions

key_components.name: Test Suite
key_components.description: Unit and integration tests for bot functionality (34 test files)

features.title: Complete Mobile Adaptation for Telegram Bot Web Interface
features.description: Comprehensive mobile optimization delivering mobile-first CSS architecture, unified state management, touch gestures, lazy loading, adaptive API performance, and Playwright testing across 5 devices.
